attributes.action: introduce taxation legislation to require the hypothecation of tax revenues raised in relation to specific climate improvement initiatives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition seeks to protect the environment by requiring revenues raised from taxes on the individual and businesses which have been introduced to reduce ecological damage to the environment to be hypothecated for expenditure only on specified climate improvement initiatives.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
